name: EnglishHelper
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: english helper
des:
English Helper is a tool to help you better your pronunciation in English.

Here's how it works:
1. Alexa will tell you a quick story
2. Repeat after her sentence by sentence
3. Then, we will practice some words you got wrong

Alexa will give you feedback based on what you said and give you some tips to improve your pronunciation!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
